column4: BRIEF-Chou Associates Management Inc Reports 6.06% Passive Stake In Resolute Forest Products Inc
column6: * CHOU ASSOCIATES MANAGEMENT INC REPORTS 6.06% PASSIVE STAKE IN RESOLUTE FOREST PRODUCTS INC AS OF MARCH 31 - SEC FILING Source text for Eikon: [ID:bit.ly/34vTpUZ] Further company coverage:

column4: Greenpeace says Resolute Forest Products owes it $669,000 in attorneys' fees
column5: Greenpeace is seeking to recover roughly $669,000 in legal fees it incurred defending a defamation lawsuit brought by a Canadian timber company.
column6: Resolute Forest Products sued the environmental group in 2016 for allegedly carrying out a campaign to falsely label the company a “forest destroyer” and drive away its customers.
column7: To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2txYgDd
